title: Candidate Trump vowed to make America affordable again. President Trump says it’s a ‘scam’ | CNN Business

content:
President Donald Trump has repeatedly argued the affordability issue is an epic scam conjured up by Democrats.
Its a con job. I think affordability is the greatest con job, Trump said from the Oval … [+5545 chars]
